generic: Hang on, I need a minute!

I only have so many fingers to push so many buttons! Relax!

I need a moment to breathe!
Honey, please, one at a time.
*You're going too fast senpai uwu I can't take it uwu*

langIntro.global: Okay, from now on I'll speak {{LANGUAGE}} in this server. {{LANGJOKE}}

langIntro.language_joke:
[NOTE TO TRANSLATOR] This is not an usual translation string, please replace this ENTIRE string with a light-hearted stereotype joke about Pollux speaking this language, preferably something that makes sense for speakers of that language. 
 EXAMPLES:
 [BRAZILIAN PORTUGUESE] - 'because nobody cares about portugal afterall'
 [KOREAN] 'i can already feel my APM rising'
 [FRENCH] 'don't even dare to make baguette jokes'
 [RUSSIAN] 'now bring me a vodka'
 -use your creativity to come up with a cool and original one!

[NOTE FOR USERS: **If you're reading this awkward bunch of text, please blame the translator for not doing a good job on translating this]

items.confirmDestroy: Are you sure you want to destroy this item?
items.destroyed: Item destroyed! This is what remained from it:

marry.needRing: You need a Ring to propose, where are your manners?
marry.ringTutorial:
*Currently you have no wedding rings to be used.*

To get a Ring, you need to craft one.
For that you have to buy a **Partial Ring** at the [**Crafting Workshop**]({{craftingURL}} "Pollux Crafting Workshop!") and spend either Rubines, Jades, or Sapphires, plus any additional materials to make a Jewel for it.
You can also spend all of them to make the ultimate gemstone wedding ring!

Craft rings using `{{prefix}}craft`, start by crafting the **Partial Ring** (`{{prefix}}craft partial-ring`) then adding the gemstone of your choice with `{{prefix}}craft [ring-jade|ring-rubine|ring-sapphire|ring-stardust]`. These 4 are the *basic rings* made solely with gemstones, some items will allow you to make different rings!
marry.noneOfThisRing: Double-check your pockets, there's no such ring on your Inventory.
marry.proposal:
{{userA}} has proposed to **{{userB}}** with the **{{ringname}}**.
{{userB}} do you accept?
marry.actuallyNone: Actually you have *none*{{'none' refers to 'rings'}}. Go get one! **Now!**
marry.saidNothing: {{userB}} ran away... look at them go... oh well... wanna drink something?
marry.addToFeatured: Would you like to show {{userB}} as your featured lover in your ProfileCard?
marry.addToFeatured2: {{userB}} Would you like to do the same with {{userA}}?
marry.addToFeatured3: Display your new spouse in Profile Cards?
marry.alreadyMarriedUp: Looks like you're already married to {{userB}}. Would you like to upgrade the ring from *{{ringA}}* to **{{ringB}}**?
marry.alreadyMarriedInf: You're already married to {{userB}} with an identical or superior ring (*{{ringB}}*)! What are you trying to do?
marry.cantMarrySelf: I am pretty modern and all, but... self-marriage is a bit too much don't you think?

ship.needTupipo: The Love Calculator does not work with just one person, my dear.
ship.need2diffpipo: Unless this person is capable of mitosis, they still count as one person, I need **two** people!
quotes: Oh. _Oh no._
YOUR HOROSCOPES ARE NOT IN ALIGNMENT, PLEASE REFRAIN FROM FURTHER CONTACT.
There was only a slight hesitation before that swipe left.
Although you're familiar with each other, you don't want to get _that_ kind of familiar.
You guys could work as a couple the same way a tomato could work in a salad.
Hey! You don't hate each other! That's a start, right?
Ooh, what a spicy relationship. The spice is flour, maybe, but it's still a spice, isn't it?
A few more dates and maybe some sparks will fly!
Woah, almost a match!
Every relationship can use a bit of work, I guess.
It's a match! Your odds are about as good as mine!
Mmm, I'd watch this slow burn romance as a movie.
We're edging up into _like like_ territory!
Cosying up, are we?
Psst, Flicky and I are betting on your success. Have you crafted a partial ring yet?
Stop holding back! Confess your feelings!
I ship it!
You cutie pies are just two peas in a pod!
Damn, you guys are almost _perfect_ for each other!
So, which one of you is getting pregnant?
THE POWER COUPLE HAS ARRIVED.
Soulmates! Amazing!

thx.after:
{{userA}} sent *"Thanks"* to **{{userB}}**!
{{userB}} has been thanked **{{totalTHX}}** times.
thx.wipe: This will remove **all** {{THX}} points from {{user}}. **Are you sure you want to do that?**
thx.noself: I would rather you thank someone else.

divorce.confirmdiag: Do you agree to get a divorce from {{user}}? A fee of %EMJ% **5000 Rubines** will be charged from **both** of you. Both of your LovePoints will be **halved** as well!
divorce.saidnope: {{userB}} doesn't want a divorce. You can force it by paying %EMJ%**10000 Rubines** so I can call in a lawyer to resolve this, but both of you will lose **all of your LovePoints** !
divorce.saidnothing: {{userB}} doesn't seem to be around to say anything. You can still force a one-sided divorce by paying %EMJ%**15000 Rubines** so I can call in a lawyer to resolve this, but you will lose **all of your LovePoints**!
divorce.saidyep: {{userB}} has agreed to a friendly divorce.
divorce.forced_rej: Alright. I called in a Lawyer to deal with the situation, you're no longer married!
divorce.info:
Unhappy with your loved one? You can undo your marriage at anytime by paying some Rubines.
You can do this mutually if your counterpart agrees, or you can call in a lawyer to get things done.

Divorcing will consume love points from both partys. So please be sure that this is what you want. The ring used in this marriage **will be destroyed**!

daily.insuranceConsumed:
You missed your daily timing... but don't worry!
**Your insurance was consumed and your streak still goes on**.
Insurances remaining: **{{insuCount}}**
*Be sure to apply it again to your daily with `{{prefix}}use keepstreak daily`*
daily.streakLost: Oh noooo, your you missed daily timing and your streak is now lost! But don't worry. You can still use a **Streak Restorer** to get back where you were before ({{oldStreak}})!
daily.noRestorerInfo: You can craft a restorer with `{{prefix}}craft streakfix`
daily.yesRestorerInfo: You have a restorer in your inventory! Try `{{prefix}}use streakfix` to use it!
dailyBonus: Good morning! Let's have a lot of fun today shall we? These are your rewards for today:
You're here! Welcome back, these were waiting for you:
Did someone sleep through their alarm again? Well, take these:
Finally! I've been so lonely. Here's some incentive to make sure you come back tomorrow:
Good morning~ Did you sleep well? I didn't! I've been waiting to give you these all night:
Hello, hello, hello! Maid Pollux here! Delivery for {{username}}:
I wish someone gave me daily prizes for waking up. I guess I can live vicariously through you, so please enjoy these for me:
Hey, here's your free stuff for today! No, they're not from the bargain bin, stop asking:
Your balance is looking a little sad - let's spruce it up together! Maybe these will help:
Wow, is this what you look like in the morning? Don't answer. Take these and brush your hair:
daily.firstDaily: Hey! You are new here ...right? Well you can come by every day for some goodies!
daily.dailyNope: Hmm? Seems you already claimed your Bonuses today. You can get more in **{{remaining}}**

inventory.noSuchBox: Look, I can't see this box in there and I'm sure you can't either.
inventory.noSuchBooster: I can't see this Booster in your inventory. You probably lost it in this mess.
inventory.noSuchItem: I can se a plethora of things in your inventory, except that particular item.
inventory.browsingBox:
This is your **Lootbox** Inventory
*Open these to receive lots of cool goodies!*
inventory.browsingBooster:
This is your **Booster Pack** Inventory
*You can open them to obtain Profile Stickers*
inventory.browsingCONSUMABLE:
This is your **Consumable Items** Inventory
*They have limited usage or disappear after using, some can be used directly.*
inventory.browsingJUNK:
This is your **Junk Items** Inventory
*These items usually serve no purpose at all, but might be usable in some situations.*
inventory.browsingKEY:
This is your **Key Items** Inventory
*These items unlock certain features from other commands or entire modules.*
inventory.browsingMATERIAL:
This is your **Crafting Material Items** Inventory
*You can use them to craft other items.*
emptyJokes: Fill this inventory with your tears because it is empty.

There is nothing in this Inventory but spiders.
They all stare at you and clap. Bravo.
The inventory is as empty as your heart.
Nothing to see here. Move along.
This inventory contains: disappointment.
<Insert item here>
...Nope, still empty.
The inventory is empty, but you may now fill it with your tears.
You must be awfully optimistic if you think more items are just going to appear in this inventory.
This inventory is oh so very empty.
You have....a whole lotta nothing
You will not find a finer empty inventory anywhere.
You open the empty inventory and stare inside. The inventory stares back accusingly.
This inventory is now full of disappointment...
You stare into the abyss, the abyss stares back at you.
"FEED ME SEYMOUR"
You open the inventory to the familiar sight of nothing. Oh how you've missed that!
This inventory looks sad and deflated now that it is empty.
When you gaze long enough into the empty inventory, the inventory gazes back into you.
This inventory was once full of wondrous treasures. Then you came along...
This inventory is on strike until further notice
A single tumbleweed rolls from one side of the inventory to another
As you open the empty inventory, a number of trapped, screaming souls come swirling out... That's probably normal.
The inventory is empty, but at least the interior looks really nice. Velvet-lined and everything.
There's nothing in this inventory, but you imagine all the things it COULD'VE been...
Even though there wasn't anything in the inventory, opening it showered you in confetti! Yay!
This inventory is as empty as my well of creativity after writing all this messages

nuke.confirm:
**__This will reset all server-specific settings, including:__**
```
 -Prefix
 -ModRoles
 -Enabled/Disabled Commands and Modules
 -Drops of Rubines will be turned OFF
 -LevelUp Messages will be turned ON
 -Custom Reactions will be wiped 
 -Log Channels
```
 -This nuke will be notified in my Support Server. For everyone to see how much you fucked up. 
 -You will be unable to Nuke for 48 hours if you abuse this command I decide whether you're abusing or not. Recurring abuse and I block the command at this server.


 **Do you really wish me to send nukes?** 
 send **ok** for yes, **c** for cancel.
nuke.confirmB:
**Write the nuke reason below to confirm**
 Send **c** for cancel.
nuke.completed: Server Info has been successfully wiped and reset. Try using **+serverinfo** to see if everything was properly reset. I'm no responsible for any afterward Nuclear Fallout contamination.

reactroles.removeAll: I've removed all Reactions Registry from here. But you'll have to clear manually any reactions from the messages themselves.
reactroles.noroleshere: There are no Reaction Roles in this server.
reactroles.noReactionDel: To delete a Role Reaction, use `{{prefix}}reactionroles del [MESSAGE ID] [EMOJI]`. You can ommit `EMOJI` if you want to delete all Reactions from that Message too~
reactroles.success: Reaction Roles will be seen in this message:

shuffle.lessthan2: I need at very least two things to choose from...

help.greetings:
**Greetings! I'm Pollux. The new maid assigned to your server.**
Here's some quick explanations of my abilities:

  â€¢  The Default Prefix is `+`, you can change it with `+prefix <New Prefix>`. 
      The Global Prefix is `p!`, useful for users that don't know your custom prefix, can be disabled at the **Dashboard**. 
      The Universal Prefix is `plx!` and cannot be disabled.
help.basics:
**The Basics** - Getting started with me is as easy as building your own particle accelerator! ...wait, you never built one yourself? Well, no problem!
These are just a few of the {{commandcount}} commands I have!
help.quick_getgo: Commands you should know from the get-go
help.quick_enjoy: Commands you might enjoy playing around with
help.avail_cmdlist: List of commands currently available and supported ({{commandcount}}).
help.notenough: Is this tiny box not enough?
help.currency_overview:
My currency system is relatively complex and has several limitations and protective features. Every transaction is logged and can be traced easily, that ensures your hard work will not be eclipsed by cheaters. We log over 30 thousand transactions every day.   
        
    â€¢  Everyone starts with a bunch of **Jades** and **Rubines**, and with one **Lootbox**.
​
help.rubines_desc:
*My main currency, bright-pink gemstones made of special hexagonal scalenohedrons of Alâ‚‚Oâ‚ƒCr, used for pretty much everything!*
        Can be obtained from Daily Bonuses (`{{prefix}}daily`), Lootboxes (`+box`) and Gambling Games (`+blackjack`, `+slots`, etc.). As well as from trades with other users once you reach Level 5 and have at least a 10-day Daily Streak.
help.jades_desc:
*Crafting "currency", I use these faint-teal gems - otherwise worthless - to concoct special items just for you!*
        Can be obtained from Lootboxes, destroying Items, donating, or buying.
help.sapphires_desc:
*Premium currency, deep-blue pieces of the finest Sapphire gemstones, used to craft special items or as a buying currency for exclusive stuff.*
        Can be only obtained with donations, buying, and from special events. You get one Free Sapphire every 200 and 365 Dailies, and there's a 0.1% chance of getting one from Ultra Rare Lootboxes.
help.lootboxes_desc:
*Special chests that contain many goodies like Backgrounds, Medals, Rubines, and Sticker Boosters*.
        Can be only obtained leveling up or from random drops, drops occur based on chat activity.

         **`âš  Intentionally Spamming to force Loot Drops, cheating, or exchanging items with Alt-Accounts will get you banned from Pollux and other bots as well.`**
help.end:
**The complete list of Commands can be found at <https://pollux.gg/commands>**

Check out our Partners at **<https://pollux.gg/partners>**
See or submit fan-created artwork at **<https://pollux.gg/fanart>**
See your public Profile at **<https://pollux.gg/profile/me>**

**Cosmetics**
Background Shop **https://pollux.gg/bgshop**
Medal Shop **https://pollux.gg/medalshop**
Crafting Workshop **https://pollux.gg/crafting**
Virtual Stickers **<https://pollux.gg/stickers>** (for IRL stickers check Support Server)
Events Information **<https://pollux.gg/events>**

Support me at **<https://patreon.com/Pollux>** or **<https://pollux.gg/donate>**
Follow me on Twitter **<https://twitter.com/maidPollux>**

---

**For anything else, check the __Dashboard__: <https://pollux.gg/dashboard>**
Or join my support server: **â€‹ https://discord.gg/rEBCccS â€‹**
Invite me to your server at **<https://pollux.gg/invite>**

flags.title: Guess the Flag
flags.youhave10: You have 10 seconds to guess the country this flag belongs to. **GO!**
flags.wellDone: {{interjection}} **{{user}}** got it! This is the flag of **{{country}}**
flags.noGuess: {{interjectionB}} Looks like nobody guessed it... Better luck next time!

coinflip.coinDefeat: {{interjection}} You seem to have lost...better luck next time!

dice.invalidRoll: Invalid Roll Equation -- Only the dice will be rolled!
dice.onlyRoll5: You can only roll 5 different dices at a once!
dice.limit25: Dice streak can be shown for up to 25 rolls.
dice.noDiceRolled: Wait, there's no dices for me to roll, use `{{prefix}}roll help` if you're not sure of what you're doing~
dice.exceedLim: This Roll exceeds Character Limits, try using `-nostreak` to ommit roll values

blackjack.ongoing: You should really finish a game before trying to start another.
blackjack.newgame: Blackjack huh? You should already know the rules, so let's get started.
blackjack.youlose: Oh? I've won, too bad for you~.
blackjack.hit: Respond with `hit` to draw one more card,
blackjack.double: `double` to double your bet and draw one last card,
blackjack.surrender_res: You surrendered, that's a shame... Here's what my game would look like had we continued:
blackjack.joker: Oh no! The Joker! You're so lucky~
blackjack.blackjack_win: A Blackjack? That is not possible! Did I count the cards wrong?
blackjack.double_win: You were so daring in double that. Congratulations!
blackjack.double_lose: Double the expectation, double the disappointment.
blackjack.insurance_lost: But your insurance is mine! Teehee~ Gimme these {{insurance}} Rubines.
blackjack.insurance_win: But you had an insurance placed, so here, take {{insurance}} Rubines back.
blackjack.surrender_helper: If you're not feeling confident you can `surrender` and lose only half of your bet
blackjack.insurance_helper: I have an open Ace in this match, you can add `insurance` to your game to protect yourself from a Blackjack
blackjack.switchdeck: Now we're going to play BlackJack using the **{{deckname}}** deck!
blackjack.switchdeckEgg:
Now we're going to play BlackJack using the dick-- I mean the **deck** {{deckname}}!
OMG I'm so sorry!
blackjack.even: Seems that we broke even, here, have your rubines back.

slots.kommunism: Communist Jackpot! Your prize has been redistributed among the populous, you get 3x what they do.
slots.pollux_jackpot: Oh my, Seems to be three of me. Perhaps you deserve something... extra.
slots.jackpot: In addition to your prize, you have also gained 100 rings and an extra life
slots.bonanza: So many Rubines! Hope you don't plan on making me carry all these.
slots.potato: Potatoes... I can probably make something out of these for you.
slots.zero_1: Oh my, seems all your Rubines are mine now.
slots.zero_2: Not a single hit? that's a shame.
slots.zero_3: Perhaps if you try again you might win something?

roulette.boardDescription:
Ladies and gentlemen, weebs and otomes. You may now place your bets!
**You have __45 seconds__ until the roulette spins!**

 Place your bets replying with: `bet [AMOUNT] [BET TYPE]`
Use `bet help` or `{{prefix}}roulette help` for a detailed tutorial.
roulette.helpDescription: You can find more information on the [Pollux wiki](https://wiki.pollux.gg)!
resultsWin: Woah! Against all odds, you won **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN)!
Hmph. I'll add **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN) to your account, and look into changing these odds . . .
I can't believe you beat me! I mean, I really don't believe it. Here's your prize of **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN).
How did I lose **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN) like that?!
Congratulations! You've depleted **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN) from my savings. I hope you're happy.
Alright, you're slightly luckier than the average player. Take your **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN).
Please don't spend all your new **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN) on the club next door. Please.
Oh, interesting. You've won **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN) from me. Now, do you think you can keep your luck up?
resultsLoss: The house always wins, honey, and today, I win **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN).
You're **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN) poorer than when you started. I'm sure your luck will turn if you play just one more game, though.
What an interesting strategy. It cost you **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN).
Ouch! Are you even trying? I'll ask my new **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN), I guess.
I don't know why I was worried. That'll be **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN), please.
Thank you for your contribution of **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN) to the Pollux Event Fund.
Oh goodness! That's another **{{count}}**{{e}} $t(keywords.RBN) you're down.
resultsDraw: You didn't win, but at least you didn't lose.
You broke even. So boring! Rematch!
Well, you got nothing. You had fun, though, right? That's what matters!
Draw... hmph. Come again, and next time bring more money.
What?! A draw?! Unacceptable, use that damn command again!
Huh. We both lose and yet we both win. Do you think that philosophy can be applied to life, too?
Ooh, that was fun. Don't leave me waiting too long for the next round.
Hmm, you didn't do too badly . . . maybe one of the waitresses can top up your drink.
It's a tie! You keep what's yours, and I keep what's mine. Deal?
roulette.resultsInvalid: You somehow lost your money so your bets were dismissed.
roulette.resultsNoBet: Sadly no one placed a bet... I am *devastated* ðŸ’”
roulette.wheelDescription: {{seconds}} seconds left to place your bets! Step it up!! Add just one more!!! What if today is your lucky day~?
roulette.wheelEnd:
**Time's up, boys and girls!**
The wheel will now decide your fate... There's no turning back now.
roulette.notSoFast: You are placing bets too fast.
roulette.invalidBet: Sorry, I can't understand that bet.
roulette.missingAmount: Sorry, honey. You can't bet without money.
roulette.notAllowed: You can't place this bet right now. Shoo!
roulette.noMoney: You don't have enough money, m'dear...
roulette.minperBet: Grow some spheres, minimum bet here is **{{count}} $t(keywords.RBN)**, kid.
roulette.maxPerBet: Woah there, rich kid! Bets can't be higher than {{count}} $t(keywords.RBN).
roulette.maxBets: Calm down, you've already placed {{count}} bets.
roulette.maxtotal: Ok, ok, hold on! You can't bet more than {{count}} $t(keywords.RBN) in total!

games.ceilingBet: You can't bet more than **{{number}}** $t(keywords.RBN_plural) in this game.

loot.rareDrop: Do you know what is this? It is a **RARE** Lootbox!
loot.ultraRareDrop: I can't believe it, an **ULTRA RARE** Lootbox has dropped! you may never see one again!
lootDrop: Oh my, a Lootbox has just spawned in this channel!
Someone seems to have dropped a Lootbox here.
Sorry to interrupt, but did anyone notice this Lootbox lying over here?
Amazing! Look at what I've found!
Hey, I'm pretty sure you want to see this Lootbox here.
loot.lootPick: You all have **__20 Seconds__** to dispute it! Type `{{prefix}}pick` for a chance to claim it!
loot.goesTo:
Time's up! Let's see who's getting this Box.
**This Loot Box will be raffled between:**
loot.congrats: Well done! The box has been added to your **Inventory**. You can open it using the `{{prefix}}lootbox` command.
loot.rerolled: Let's try again, rerolling the box content...
loot.noMoreRolls: You've ran out of rerolls, you'll have to stick with this result.
loot.noFunds: You need more Rubines to reroll, perhaps next time.
loot.addedRubines: {{X}} Rubines have been added to your Balance
loot.addedJades: {{X}} Jades have been added to your Pouch
loot.addedMedal: **{{itm}}** Medal has been added to your Medals Pocket
loot.addedSticker: **{{itm}}** Sticker has been added to your Stickers Album
loot.addedBG: Background `[code:{{itm}}]` has been added to your Backgrounds Binder
loot.duplicateExchange: Duplicate {{tpe}} `{{itm}}` has been exchanged for {{X}} Rubines
loot.morons: You let a Lootbox slip by? What am I saying, of course you did.
loot.eventDrop: And there is more! This box is an **EVENT BOX** which means: **'special goodies inside'!**
loot.notThisbox: You don't seem to have that box. try `{{prefix}}lootbox` again and see the boxes you own.
loot.allItemsAdded: All items have been added to your inventory!

eastereggs.konodioda: You thought that it was Pollux, **but it was ME, DIO**!
eastereggs.vacuum: **{{user}}** has given **+1 Rep** to the Void. {{amount}} reps have been thrown into there so far.

seasonal.checkPin: Check the Pinned Message for more Info
seasonal.reactThis: React to this message to auto-receive the roles
